# EventAdapter constructor

Initialize a new event adapter object.

```csharp
public EventAdapter(Dispatcher d, NotifyCollectionChangedEventHandler handler)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| d | Dispatcher to use for raising events. |
| handler | Event handler to call in the given dispatcher's context. |
